definitions.definition: A product consisting of a liquid which has had other ingredients steeped in it to extract useful qualities.
examples: An extract of rooibos and chamomile makes a refreshing infusion .

definitions.definition: The act of steeping or soaking a substance in liquid so as to extract medicinal or herbal qualities.
The act of installing a quality into a person.
A giving of money or other resources, typically a large amount, to an organization.
The act of dipping into a fluid.
The administration of liquid substances directly into a vein for medical purposes; perfusion .

main_definition: A product consisting of a liquid which has had other ingredients steeped in it to extract useful qualities.
secondary_definitions: The act of steeping or soaking a substance in liquid so as to extract medicinal or herbal qualities.
The act of installing a quality into a person.
A giving of money or other resources, typically a large amount, to an organization.
( obsolete ) The act of dipping into a fluid.
( medicine ) The administration of liquid substances directly into a vein for medical purposes; perfusion .
